ValidationRule.description: Ensures the primary owner is a client in their primary household
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && ( NOT( FinServ__PrimaryOwner__r.OW_role_in_primary_household__c = "Client" || FinServ__PrimaryOwner__r.OW_role_in_primary_household__c = "Child" || FinServ__PrimaryOwner__r.OW_role_in_primary_household__c = "Client;Child" ) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Household__r.Type, "Trust" )) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Household__r.FinServ__Status__c, "Inactive" )) ) && NOT( $Permission.ValidationBypass ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( FinServ__Status__c, "Closed"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The primary owner must have a role of client or child in the household.
